short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome browser extension hides splitview listings on Airbnb.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever searched for a place to stay on Airbnb and were dismayed to see only split stays - the option to stay at multiple Airbnb's in the same span of time? With this extension, you can hide split stays and only see regular stays.

You can view the source code here: https://github.com/garnetred/airbnb-no-splitstays. 

Privacy Policy
Airbnb No Split Stays accesses Google's scripting permissions for browser extensions to remove the split stay buttons and list items if you're on the Airbnb search page at the following urls: airbnb.com, airbnb.es, airbnb.mx, airbnb.co.uk, airbnb.ca, airbnb.de, airbnb.fr, airbnb.it, and airbnb.com.br.
